title: Inzaghi trades newly promoted Pisa for Serie B return with Palermo
description: Filippo Inzaghi has joined Palermo a matter of days after he left Pisa. Inzaghi, the former AC Milan and Juventus star and the brother of former Inter and current Al-Hilal coach Simone, led Pisa to promotion from Serie B in 2024-25. Yet instead of staying on to oversee Pisa’s first season in Serie A in […] The post Inzaghi trades newly promoted Pisa for Serie B return with Palermo appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Huijsen excited to get to work under Alonso as Mbappe misses training
description: Dean Huijsen is delighted to be working under a coach of Xabi Alonso’s calibre as the defender looks forward to his Real Madrid debut. After a hugely successful spell in charge of Bayer Leverkusen, Alonso joined Madrid at the end of May, replacing Carlo Ancelotti. Huijsen became the first signing of the Alonso era, with […] The post Huijsen excited to get to work under Alonso as Mbappe misses training appeared first on Soccer News.
